head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SOLOMON, JOAN LARKEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SOLOMON, JOAN LARKEY

block.p: SOLOMON-Joan Larkey. On July 21, 2000. Beloved wife of George, cherished mother of Andrew, Barney and Elizabeth, mother-in-law of Elizabeth Bartman and grandmother of Daria Solomon, and dear sister of Lewis, Morris and James Larkey. Services will be held at Gramercy Park Chapel, 152 Second Avenue, Sunday, July 23 at 11 AM. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to Gynecological Oncology Research Fund, NYU School of Medicine, C/O James Speyer, M.D., 160 East 32 Street, NY, NY 10016.
